DOC.brief_summary: Patients seen with acne lesions not having responded to existing treatments will be offered a placebo or a topical preparation consisting of Vitamin A USP with or without Azithromycin for a duration of 4-6 months USP for the objective of resolving the lesions without systemic side effects and via weekly follow-ups.
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin A and Azithromycin for Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: The concentrations of the active ingredients is based on the enclosed articles and the formulations have been modified with an objective of minimizing the side effects.
DOC.criteria: Patients with active lesions Patients on a treatment Asymptomatic patients
